data.description: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Tac/Appended Mag + Ensemble/Demo/Slideshot + Timed Payload/MKC

PvP: Hitmark/Truesight/Steadyhand/Fastdraw + Accurized + Slideshot/Moving Target/Tunnel Vision/Demo + Timed Payload/MKC/Opening Shot
Judgement can only 2 tap with MKC x 3, but x1 and x2 both improve the usability (2c1b at x1, 1c2b at x2)

PvE: Any but Smoothbore or Rifled + Assault/Appended/Tac/Light Mag + Field Prep/Grave Robber/Threat Detector/Surplus + 1-2 Punch/Frenzy

PvP: Full Choke/Barrel Shroud + Accurized/Assault Mag + Slideshot/Surplus/Threat Detector + Snapshot/Elemental Cap
This is an aggressive frame shotgun that can have the highest Handling of any in the game on an Arc subclass with Elemental Capacitor and either Thread Detector or Surplus.
